name: Penguinz0: A fight for good genes
name_original: Penguinz0: A fight for good genes
description: A 2D platformer pixel art game that revolves around famous youtuber and twitch streamer penguinz0's attempts of getting taller. Thanks to some chemicals provided by Tiana, Penguinz0 is able to explore his own body, trying to repair his deficient genes. How is it going to go for him? Play the game and find out!
